mapper.select: SELECT c.customer_id customerId, c.first_name firstName, c.last_name lastName, c.mail, c.phone, c.point, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM delivery_addresses WHERE customer_id=c.customer_id) numOfAddress FROM customers c WHERE c.deleted_at IS NULL ;

SELECT da.delivery_address_id deliveryAddressId, da.region_id regionId, (SELECT region_name FROM regions WHERE region_id = da.region_id) regionName, da.address_name addressName, da.address, da.post_code postCode, da.main FROM delivery_addresses da WHERE da.deleted_at IS NULL AND da.customer_id=#{customerId};

INSERT INTO customers( first_name, last_name, mail, phone, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{mail}, #{phone}, NOW(), NOW() );
SELECT customer_id AS customerId, first_name AS firstName, last_name AS lastName, mail, phone FROM customers WHERE deleted_at IS NULL AND mail = #{mail} LIMIT 1;

UPDATE customers SET first_name = #{firstName}, last_name = #{lastName}, mail = #{mail}, phone = #{phone}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE customer_id= #{customerId} ;
SELECT customer_id AS customerId, first_name AS firstName, last_name AS lastName, mail, phone FROM customers WHERE deleted_at IS NULL AND customer_id = #{customerId} LIMIT 1;
SELECT region_id AS regionId, region_name AS regionName FROM regions WHERE deleted_at IS NULL ;
